item.title: About
item.description: 中文介绍： My name is Victor, Li Chuang. I’m currently a Year 2 PhD student of NUS Intergrative Science and Engineering Program (ISEP) under NUS Graduate School (NUSGS) starting from August 2020. I am jointly advised by Prof Kan Min-Yen from Web IR/NLP Group (WING) in School of Computing (SOC)and Prof Li Haizhou at Human Language Technology (HLT) Lab. My research interests are in Recommendation System, Conversational Recommendation System and Dialogue System.

item.title: First post
item.description: 中文博客内容将在稍后更新，推荐是用谷歌翻译进行英译汉！
